bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, Designs for Women geometry small tube low stand over frame, double-butted front triangle with ORE DT, 13/15":80mm and 17/19":100mm travel, reinforced disc mount, externally machined HT, forged drop outs with eyelets and 06 replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Rock Shox J3 SL Le Femme, 80/100mm travel, preload and rebound adjustment, alloy steerer w/ Lock Out, reduced spring rates
Alloy, 25mm rise, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree sweep, 620mm width
Specialized Sidewinder, dual density slim profile
Tektro "V", linear spring, stainless steel pipe
Tektro "V", linear spring, stainless steel pipe
SRAM 3.0, 34.9mm clamp, top mount, bottom pull
Truvativ, 68x113mm, Power Spline, sealed cartridge bearing with double crank stops
Dual sided, composite body, steel cage, toe clip compatible
SUN CR-18, 26", 32h, double walled w/machined sidewalls, eyelets
Joy-Tech cassette, polished races and double sealed, 32h
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
